Articles.Content: could you add a Drogue chute to the nosecone so it separates easier?
yep already in the works

Negative ghost rider. Pattern is full.

Ah, right. I was thinking that the RCS rings were on the nose section forward of the main parachute, that does get discarded. Good catch!

New Parts!

All new Gemini pod exterior,RCS is on the pod now.

Combined the RCS SAS decoupler into one part

Two new parachutes, drogue and regular, both are stack-able and can surface attach

New nosecones for your rockets, in 2.5 and 1.25m sizes

New decouplers and wall fairings. Though I highly recommend you use the procedural fairings mod from now on.

2 new 1.25m engines, Mini Orbital Bertha, and Mini 4x800

Looks Great, Can't wait sinds FASA is a default mod for me

Great work!

have you considered building the Gemini Lunar Lander?

or the mars lander?
Wow never seen the Mars lander before. You can already do a Gemini moon lander, has a descent stage in the pack already.
Nice. Those new fairing walls look great, frizzank.
I just noticed why the red escape tower wasn't powerful enough for the Gemini capsule. It was intended for the stock black capsule.
Its for the stock one man pod, its suppose to be a Mercury pod stand-in until I can make a custom one.
hate to be the one to say it, but the IVAs busted again
Yea I had to move the interior around to fit it into the new pod, the buttons and stuff are separate, so its broke. Will update it as soon as its fixed

Newly redone interior with buttons and stuff.

Just uploaded it to spaceport!
Not sure if it's a glitch, but Gemini seems to submerge almost entirely after splashdown.

That Mars Lander is another variant of the Gemini Moon Lander. The Gemini is too small to comfortably go to the Moon, so imagine staying in there for the 500 day transit to Mars.

EDIT: Installed the new update. Half the parts aren't showing up. Put the Gemini and Mercury in the Parts folder of Squad, put it in its separate folder in GameData.

Edited August 27, 2013 by CaptRobau
you dont need to put any mods into the squad folder, just place the final folder (ie the last folder before the part directories) directly into the gamedata folder

Can you bring back the old 2.5m diameter fuel/monprop pack for the Centaur? I liked using that for my CSM, and I don't know of any way to adapt the Gemini capsule to have a 1.25m docking port on top of it.

Installed the new update. Half the parts aren't showing up. Put the Gemini and Mercury in the Parts folder of Squad, put it in its separate folder in GameData.

Unzip and put the FASA folder in your KSP/Gamedata directory. This is the same for any mod for KSP, they all go in the GameData directory

Can you bring back the old 2.5m diameter fuel/monprop pack for the Centaur? I liked using that for my CSM, and I don't know of any way to adapt the Gemini capsule to have a 1.25m docking port on top of it.

Are you saying you need a 2.5m fuel tank that has mono in it as well?

The Gemini Nosecone has a docking port on it?

Edited August 27, 2013 by frizzank
the built-in rcs thrusters on the Gemini pod seem to have zero roll control?

You have to add the small Gemini RCS thrusters to get rotational control. The new system does not distribute the thrust correctly for rotational control.

Edited August 27, 2013 by frizzank
You ever going to make a warhead for the Titan?

Well I wasn't but then this this mod came along.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/47065-0-21-ICBM-Launch-Silo

I am now required by the Titan ICBM convention to create a warhead for it. Probably going to be a probe core with some MIRV's attached to it or something.

Article 3-26.a Of the TICBMC

Any one creating a rocket using the Titan launch system is required to make a nuclear warhead for said missile once a launch silo is created. Even if said rocket is originally created for space exploration or other scientific study.

is anyone else getting an odd roll when they try to use rcs?

Can you describe what your doing to produce this odd roll, is it just the pod by itself or is it when used with some other parts, or is it just when rotating or translating?

Can't wait till I can nuke North Kerea!

It will not be an actual nuke just a probe core that looks like the nosecone from the Titan II missile. Sorry no mushroom clouds.....
